attributes.action: After overcoming COVID19 let church bells across the country ring out in unison
attributes.additional_details:
The COVID19 outbreak has created move disruption than any World War the United Kingdom has been through. In celebration of coming through this we should have a nationwide way of celebrating The UK overcoming this threat to our nation.

What better way than to hear church bells ringing out in every city, every town and every village.
attributes.background: Issue an instruction for all Church Bells to ring out celebrating the end of the COVID19 outbreak in the United Kingdom. This to happen in every church in every city and village, which has bells that can be rung.

rejection.details:
This would be a matter for religious institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
